TITLE: Use click-option-group
DETAILS: To help sort options in categories in help.

TITLE: Use click-aliases
DETAILS: To allow for aliases (TBC: user-defined in config file?)

TITLE: edit existing
DETAILS: When calling edit, populate defaults with existing data.

TITLE: sanity checks
DETAILS: Check data consistency in load_data and save_data.

TITLE: find csv up dir
DETAILS: Try to find .klyban.csv on upper directories if not in the existing one.

TITLE: semantic tags
DETAILS: Allow tags starting with # to refer to a Github issue if data file is in a git repository having a remote on Github.

TITLE: style metadata
DETAILS: Add a METADATA column to host styling tags.

TITLE: fix quotes
DETAILS: After 'add', empty columns got remaining quotes.
